metadata.title: CVE-2024-41017 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jfs: don't walk off the end of ealistAdd a check before visiting the members of ea tomake sure each ea stays within the ealist.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
